original_title: SL Rupee strengthens against USD after days of depreciation
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Rupee (SLR) has considerably appreciated against the US Dollar (USD) today compared to the last 15 days, the Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) said.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD stands at Rs. 309.70 while the selling rate is Rs. 322.68.
However, yesterday’s buying rate of USD was Rs. 322.96 while the selling rate was Rs. 335.40
